mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunName
select distinct dongName, dongCode from houseinfo where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select i.aptName aptName, i.dongCode dongCode, i.dongName dongName, i.lat lat, i.lng lng, d.floor floor , i.buildYear buildYear, i.jibun jibun, d.dealAmount recentPrice, d.area area, round(d.area/3.3057) acreage from housedeal d inner join houseinfo i on d.aptCode = i.aptCode and d.no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = d.aptCode) where dongCode = #{dong} order by aptName;
select hangjungCode from hangjungcode where dongCode = #{dong} limit 1
select place, b.gugunname as gugunname, placedetail, lat, lng, maxcount, btype from bike b inner join guguncode g on b.gugunname = g.gugunname where left(g.guguncode, 5) = #{gugun}
